name: com.metris.xposed.bluetoothtoolkitfree

releases.description:
- Fixed NoSuchMethodError introduced in the last version
- Always On Discovery is now available for every Android version! Enable it to make your device always discoverable, no matter what (it's even free!)
- Translations update
releases.descriptionHTML:
• Fixed NoSuchMethodError introduced in the last version
  • Always On Discovery is now available for every Android version! Enable it to make your device always discoverable, no matter what (it's even free!)
  • Translations update

releases.description:
- Even darker backgrounds!
- Fix error in BT activation dialog
- Alert when sending files with 0 byte size
releases.descriptionHTML:
• Even darker backgrounds!
  • Fix error in BT activation dialog
  • Alert when sending files with 0 byte size

releases.description:
- Fixed thread link
- Fixed ClassNotFoundError

Plus all the great additions of the 2.6 release!
- Compatible and tested with Android 11 (R) and with all previous versions!
- You can finally receive EVERY file type! Even files without an extension!
- New auto reception folder only for Android 11
- Fixed trial handling and purchase
- New Material 2.0 UI!
- Updated files list to allow better control over the files
- Fixed dialog and list behavior on transfer completed
- Fixed many bugs on Xposed side
releases.descriptionHTML:
• Fixed thread link
  • Fixed ClassNotFoundError

Plus all the great additions of the 2.6 release!

  • Compatible and tested with Android 11 (R) and with all previous versions!
  • You can finally receive EVERY file type! Even files without an extension!
  • New auto reception folder only for Android 11
  • Fixed trial handling and purchase
  • New Material 2.0 UI!
  • Updated files list to allow better control over the files
  • Fixed dialog and list behavior on transfer completed
  • Fixed many bugs on Xposed side

• Compatible and tested with Android 11 (R) and with all previous versions!
  • You can finally receive EVERY file type! Even files without an extension!
  • New auto reception folder only for Android 11
  • Fixed trial handling and purchase

readme:
Thanks to Bluetooth ToolKit you can receive any file via bluetooth, choose how to be notified when you receive a file, Materialize different parts forgotten by Google... All this in an adorable and sugary graphic! (now 2.0!)

All changes are on-the-go, and don't require reboots.

# Some Features:
1. Receive any file type through bluetooth, with total control. Even files without any extension!
2. Decide in what way you will be notified when there is an incoming file
3. Open the list of files after reception
4. Set the discovery timeout to infinite
5. And more to come...

**WARNING**: You need to make a small in-app purchase to unlock all functions.
